transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan ji sir namaskar Aditya baat kar raha hun India Mart se kaise hain sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi mana kiya tha na ki teen char din me baad ek phone mat karna.
Executive: Sir aapne Saturday ko phone kiya tere ko malum hai tune kitna phone tujhe kiya hai kisi ke kahan gaya tha main bahar gaya tha kitna phone kiya hai teri chutti thi maine ek phone kiya tere tujhe bola ki mera chutti hai fir maine kiya.
Executive: Sir Friday ko aapne bola tha do din ke liye aap leave pe hai to Saturday Sunday do din leave hua uske baad Monday ko maine contact kiya aapko maine.
Customer: Sunday ko bola tha na ki main aaunga to samne se karunga tera contact.
Executive: Sir ek to phone kiya tune tera tera kya hota hai sir aaram se theek hai main maan raha hun ki kal maine call kiya tha kyunki aapka jo ek bar karna chahiye pura din me ek bar karna chahiye jab wo nahi uthega to manna chahiye na ki waha nahi hazir hoga to ye nahi kiya hoga na.
Executive: Sir aapki madam uthai thi unhone bola ki sham tak wo baat karenge to humne uske baad nahi kiya.
Customer: Haan wahi to aapki madam ne na matlab hai na hum wahi aapko to unhone bola ki sham tak wo milenge to maine uske baad nahi kiya uske baad sham me ek bar aapko call kiya.
Customer: Sham ko wo mere ko mili to usne bola ki phone aaya tha maine number dekha to mujhe pata tha ki tera wo tumhara itna to maine kiya samne se.
Executive: Sham me to call nahi aaya tha sir.
Customer: Haan to main aaunga tab samne se kar lunga.
Executive: Theek hai abhi aap bahar hi hai sir.
Customer: Haan wo wedding me aaya hun.
Executive: Theek hai sir mainly mainly mera yahi concern tha aapko yahi batana tha ki aapka jo aapne bola tha na ki 50 by list jo mujhe chahiye tha wo aapke account me dal chuka hai mere side se jo mera work tha maine wo complete kar diya hai aap jab aaiyega to ye cheez dekh lijiyega theek hai sir bas mera yahi concern tha aapko yahi batana tha mainly pata nahi tha aapko jiski wajah se aapne mujhe kam se kam 10 call kiye honge uske liye theek hai to mera work mere side se complete hua tha mera ye responsibility thi ki aapko batana main nahi karta aapko agar mujhe pata hota ki aap teen char din ke liye absent hai matlab apne jagah pe sirf leave le rakha hai ya fir wo cheez hai.
Customer: Main company ka owner hun absent nahi hun.
Executive: Sir matlab theek hai main aapne aapne bola ki main leave pe hun to uske hisab se maine us cheez ko response diya bhi bolna chahiye na usko kya bolenge band rakha hai do teen din office.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai okay.
Customer: Acha tha par.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was called multiple times.

- Customer needed 50 buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for calling multiple times.

- Executive confirmed 50 buyleads added to account.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, multiple calls, subscription
